description: White teapot and cover modelled by Johann Jacob Irminger, the compressed spherical body applied on either side with a basket of fruit, the shoulder with paterae repeated around the pineapple knop on the cover.
dimension: a(teapot)H.3-3/4 x W.6-3/8 x D.4-1/2in. b(lid)H.1-1/4 x Dia.2-1/2in.
title: Teapot
